RateInfo.cancellationPolicy: We understand that sometimes your travel plans change. We do not charge a change or cancel fee. However, this property (Hilton Petaling Jaya) imposes the following penalty to its customers that we are required to pass on: Cancellations or changes made after 2:00 PM ((GMT+08:00) Kuala Lumpur, Singapore) on Sep 23, 2017, or no-shows, are subject to a 1 Night Room & Tax penalty.
